stimulusHtml: Assuming that the size of the tusks is heritable, which of the following is the most likely long-term effect of poachers targeting African elephants with large tusks?

features.html: Poaching is the illegal hunting or capturing of wild animals. Both male and female African elephants have tusks that are a significant source of ivory used for ornaments and jewelry.

choicesHtml: An increase in average tusk size because of the need to provide more ivory for the poaching hunters
A decrease in average tusk size because elephants with large tusks are less likely to survive to reproduce
An increase in average tusk size to provide the elephants with a defensive mechanism against poachers
A decrease in average tusk size to reduce the energy investment in the tusks
